CustomField.description: If you want to use SSL (and you likely do want to use SSL), you will need to include the https:// since the SF URL control will use http:// if it is not specified.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If you want to use SSL (and you likely do want to use SSL), you will need to include the https:// since the SF URL control will use http:// if it is not specified.
CustomField.label: Community Hostname
